title: New Artist
text:
Web_Designer Job Opening \
    Year of Experience: 1 - 3 years\
    Education: Any Graduate\
    Location: Bangalore \
    Direct Walk-in Interviews from 14th to 22nd April from 10:00 to 17:00\
    About the Job:\
    Must have the knowledge of Technologies\
    Technologies \
    HTML5\
    CSS 3.0\
    Jquery\
    JavaScript\
    BootStrap and latest designing (Knowledgeable) \
    About the Company :\
    Nextwebi delivers high-end IT solutions to businesses.\
    We offer best class web solutions to your business that helps you to succeed in your ventures.
